3.name: They Grow Up Too Fast
3.description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without letting any Scion mature.

4.name: Respiratory Runner
4.description: Kill the Abyssal Sire after only stunning him once.

5.name: Don't Whip Me
5.description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without being hit by any external tentacles.

6.name: Demonic Rebound
6.description: Use the Vengeance spell to reflect the damage from the Abyssal Sire's explosion back to him.

7.name: Don't Stop Moving
7.description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without taking damage from any miasma pools.

8.name: Perfect Sire
8.description: Kill the Abyssal Sire without taking damage from the external tentacles, miasma pools, explosion or damage from the Abyssal Sire without praying the appropriate protection prayer.

11.name: Collateral Damage
11.description: Kill Kree'arra in a private instance without ever attacking him directly.

12.name: Airborne Showdown
12.description: Finish off Kree'arra whilst all of his bodyguards are dead.

13.name: Swoop No More
13.description: Kill Kree'arra in a private instance without taking any melee damage from the boss or his bodyguards.

14.name: The Worst Ranged Weapon
14.description: Kill Kree'arra by only dealing damage to him with a salamander.

15.name: Feather Hunter
15.description: Kill Kree'arra 30 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

18.name: Ourg Freezer

19.name: Ourg Freezer II

20.name: General Showdown

22.name: Keep Away

23.name: Ourg Killer
23.description: Kill General Graardor 15 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

55.name: Unrequired Antifire

63.name: Sorry, What Was That?

64.name: Praying to the Gods

67.name: Hot on Your Feet

68.name: Finding the Weak Spot

73.name: I'd Rather Not Learn

78.name: Mage of the Swamp

79.name: I'd Rather Be Illiterate
79.description: Kill the Deranged Archaeologist without anyone being hit by his "Learn to Read" attack.

85.description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without taking damage from Dusk's prison attack.

86.name: Granite Footwork
86.description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without taking damage from Dawn's rockfall attack.

87.name: Heal No More
87.description: Kill the Grotesque Guardians without letting Dawn receive any healing from her orbs.

91.name: Perfect Grotesque Guardians II

102.description: Kill the Corrupted Hunllef without taking damage from: Tornadoes, Damaging Floor or Stomp Attacks. Also, do not take damage off prayer and do not attack the Corrupted Hunllef with the wrong weapon.

190.name: A Long Trip

241.description: Kill Verzik without any Nylocas being frozen and without anyone taking damage from the Nylocas.

242.name: A Timely Snack

243.name: Perfect Theatre
243.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood without anyone dying through any means and whilst everyone in the team completes the following Combat Achievement tasks in a single run: "Perfect Maiden", "Perfect Bloat", "Perfect Nylocas", "Perfect Sotetseg", "Perfect Xarpus" and "Perfect Verzik".

244.name: Perfect Maiden
244.description: Kill The Maiden of Sugadinti without anyone in the team taking damage from the following sources: Blood Spawn projectiles and Blood Spawn trails. Also, without taking damage off prayer and without letting any of the Nylocas Matomenos heal The Maiden.

245.name: Perfect Bloat
245.description: Kill the Pestilent Bloat without anyone in the team taking damage from the following sources: Pestilent flies, Falling body parts or The Pestilent Bloats stomp attack.

246.name: Perfect Nylocas
246.description: Kill the Nylocas Vasilias without anyone in the team attacking any Nylocas with the wrong attack style, without letting a pillar collapse and without getting hit by any of the Nylocas Vasilias attacks whilst off prayer.

247.name: Perfect Sotesteg
247.description: Kill Sotetseg without anyone in the team stepping on the wrong tile in the maze, without getting hit by the tornado and without taking any damage from Sotetseg's attacks whilst off prayer.

248.name: Perfect Xarpus
248.description: Kill Xarpus without anyone in the team taking any damage from Xarpus' attacks and without letting an exhumed heal Xarpus more than twice.

249.name: Perfect Verzik
249.description: Defeat Verzik Vitur without anyone in the team taking damage from Verzik Vitur's attacks other than her spider form's correctly prayed against regular magical and ranged attacks.

250.name: Can't Drain This

251.name: Can You Dance?
251.description: Kill Xarpus without anyone in the team using a ranged or magic weapon.

252.name: Morytania Only

253.name: Back in My Day...

255.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (Trio) in less than 20 minutes.

259.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood (5-scale) in less than 16 minutes.

274.description: Kill Vorkath without losing any prayer points.

317.name: Perfect Olm (Solo)

318.name: Perfect Olm (Trio)
318.description: Kill the Great Olm in a trio raid without any team member taking damage from any of the following: Teleport portals, Fire Walls, Healing pools, Crystal Bombs, Crystal Burst or Prayer Orbs. You also cannot let his claws regenerate or take damage from the same acid pool back to back.

319.name: Blind Spot

320.name: Blizzard Dodger

323.description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Solo) in less than 17 minutes.

324.name: Chambers of Xeric (5-Scale) Speed-Chaser
324.description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (5-scale) in less than 15 minutes.

325.name: Chambers of Xeric (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
325.description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (5-scale) in less than 12 minutes and 30 seconds.

326.name: Chambers of Xeric (Trio) Speed-Chaser
326.description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Trio) in less than 16 minutes and 30 seconds.

327.name: Chambers of Xeric (Trio) Speed-Runner
327.description: Complete a Chambers of Xeric (Trio) in less than 14 minutes and 30 seconds.

329.name: Perfect Zalcano
329.description: Kill Zalcano 5 times in a row without leaving or getting hit by the following: Falling rocks, rock explosions, Zalcano powering up, or standing in a red symbol.

330.name: Team Player
330.description: Receive imbued tephra from a golem.

331.name: The Spurned Hero
331.description: Kill Zalcano as the player who has dealt the most damage to her.

334.name: Yarr No More
334.description: Receive kill-credit for K'ril Tsutsaroth without him using his special attack.

335.name: Demonic Showdown
335.description: Finish off K'ril Tsutsaroth whilst all of his bodyguards are dead.

336.name: The Bane of Demons
336.description: Defeat K'ril Tsutsaroth in a private instance using only demonbane spells.

337.name: Demonic Defence
337.description: Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth in a private instance without taking any of his melee hits.

338.name: Demon Whisperer
338.description: Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth in a private instance without ever being hit by his bodyguards.

339.name: Demonbane Weaponry II
339.description: Finish off K'ril Tsutsaroth with a demonbane weapon.

340.name: Ash Collector
340.description: Kill K'ril Tsutsaroth 20 times in a private instance without leaving the room.

341.name: Half-Way There
341.description: Kill a Jal-Zek within the Inferno.

343.name: The Floor Is Lava
343.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting Jal-ImKot dig during any wave in the Inferno.

344.name: Playing with Jads
344.description: Complete wave 68 of the Inferno within 30 seconds of the first JalTok-Jad dying.

345.name: No Luck Required
345.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without being attacked by TzKal-Zuk and without taking damage from a JalTok-Jad.

346.name: Nibblers, Begone!
346.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting a pillar fall before wave 67.

347.name: Wasn't Even Close
347.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without letting your hitpoints fall below 50 during any wave in the Inferno.

348.name: Budget Setup
348.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping a Twisted Bow within the Inferno.

349.name: Nibbler Chaser
349.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without using any magic spells during any wave in the Inferno.

350.name: Facing Jad Head-on II
350.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without equipping any range or mage weapons before wave 69.

351.name: Jad? What Are You Doing Here?
351.description: Kill Tzkal-Zuk without killing the JalTok-Jad which spawns during wave 69.

352.name: Inferno Speed-Runner
352.description: Complete the Inferno in less than 65 minutes.

355.name: Dress Like You Mean It
355.description: Subdue Tempoross while wearing any variation of the angler outfit.

356.name: Master of Buckets
356.description: Extinguish at least 5 fires during a single Tempoross fight.

357.name: Calm Before the Storm
357.description: Repair either a mast or a totem pole.

358.name: Why Cook?
358.description: Subdue Tempoross, getting rewarded with 10 reward permits from a single Tempoross fight.

359.name: The Lone Angler
359.description: Subdue Tempoross alone without getting hit by any fires, torrents or waves.

360.name: Fire in the Hole!
360.description: Attack Tempoross from both sides by loading both cannons on both ships.

364.name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Trialist
364.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's first challenge in less than 45 seconds.

365.name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Chaser
365.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge in less than 3 minutes.

366.name: TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Speed-Runner
366.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth challenge in less than 5 minutes.

367.name: Facing Jad Head-on III
367.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's second challenge with only melee.

368.name: Facing Jad Head-on IV
368.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fourth challenge with only melee.

369.name: Supplies? Who Needs 'em?
369.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge without having anything in your inventory.

370.name: It Wasn't a Fluke
370.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's fifth and sixth challenges back to back without failing.

371.name: Multi-Style Specialist
371.description: Complete TzHaar-Ket-Rak's third challenge while using a different attack style for each JalTok-Jad.

372.name: Stop Right There!
372.description: Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without letting blood spawns create more than 15 blood trails.

373.name: Personal Space
373.description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode with a least 3 people in the room, without anyone in your team standing on top of each other.

374.name: Royal Affairs
374.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode, complete the Nylocas room without ever letting the Nylocas Prinkipas change styles.

375.name: Harder Mode I
375.description: Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone sharing the ball with anyone, without anyone dying, and without anyone taking damage from any of its other attacks or stepping on the wrong tile in the maze.

376.name: Harder Mode II
376.description: Defeat Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode after letting the exhumeds heal him to full health and without anyone in the team taking any damage.

377.name: Nylo Sniper
377.description: Defeat Verzik Vitur's in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone in your team causing a Nylocas to explode by getting too close.

378.name: Team Work Makes the Dream Work
378.description: When Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode uses her yellow power blast attack while the tornadoes are active, have everyone get through the attack without taking damage. This cannot be completed with one player alive

379.name: Harder Mode III
379.description: Defeat Verzik Vitur in the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode without anyone attacking her with a melee weapon during her third phase.

380.name: Pack Like a Yak
380.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time, with no deaths and without anyone buying anything from a supply chest.

381.name: Hard Mode? Completed It
381.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode within the challenge time.

382.name: Theatre: HM (Trio) Speed-Runner
382.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (Trio) with an overall time of less than 23 minutes.

383.name: Theatre: HM (4-Scale) Speed-Runner
383.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (4-scale) with an overall time of less than 21 minutes.

384.name: Theatre: HM (5-Scale) Speed-Runner
384.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode (5-scale) with an overall time of less than 19 minutes.

385.name: Theatre of Blood: HM Grandmaster
385.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Hard Mode 50 times.

386.name: Anticoagulants
386.description: Defeat the Maiden of Sugadinti in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without letting any bloodspawn live for longer than 10 seconds.

387.name: Appropriate Tools
387.description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode with everyone having a salve amulet equipped.

388.name: They Won't Expect This
388.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, enter the Pestilent Bloat room from the opposite side.

389.name: Chally Time
389.description: Defeat the Pestilent Bloat in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode by using a crystal halberd special attack as your final attack.

390.name: Nylocas, On the Rocks
390.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, freeze any 4 Nylocas with a single Ice Barrage spell.

391.name: Just To Be Safe
391.description: Defeat Sotetseg in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode after having split the big ball with your entire team. This must be done with a group size of at least 2.

392.name: Don't Look at Me!
392.description: Kill Xarpus in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without him reflecting any damage to anyone.

393.name: No-Pillar
393.description: Survive Verzik Vitur's pillar phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without losing a single pillar.

394.name: Attack, Step, Wait
394.description: Survive Verzik Vitur's second phase in the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode without anyone getting bounced by Verzik.

395.name: Pass It On
395.description: In the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode, successfully pass on the green ball to a team mate.

396.name: Theatre of Blood: SM Speed-Chaser
396.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode in less than 17 minutes.

397.name: Theatre of Blood: SM Adept
397.description: Complete the Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode 1 time.

398.name: Into the Den of Giants
398.description: Kill a Hill Giant, Moss Giant and Fire Giant in the Giant Cave within the Shayzien region.

399.name: Sit Back and Relax
399.description: Deal 100 damage to creatures using undead thralls.

403.name: Perfect Phosani's Nightmare
403.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare while only taking damage from husks, power blasts and weakened Parasites. Also, without having your attacks slowed by the Nightmare Spores or letting a Sleepwalker reach Phosani's Nightmare.

406.name: Crush Hour
406.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare while killing every parasite and husk in one hit.

407.name: I Would Simply React
407.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare without allowing your prayer to be disabled.

408.name: Dreamland Express
408.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare without a sleepwalker reaching her during her desperation phase.

409.name: Can't Wake Up
409.description: Kill Phosani's Nightmare 5 times in a row without leaving Phosani's Dream.

413.name: A siphon will solve this
413.description: Kill Nex without letting her heal from her Blood Siphon special attack.

414.name: Contain this!
414.description: Kill Nex without anyone taking damage from any Ice special attack.

415.name: There is no escape!
415.description: Kill Nex without anyone being hit by the Smoke Dash special attack.

416.name: Nex Trio
416.description: Kill Nex with three or less players at the start of the fight.

417.name: Nex Duo
417.description: Kill Nex with two or less players at the start of the fight.

418.name: I should see a doctor
418.description: Kill Nex whilst a player is coughing.

419.name: Perfect Nex
419.description: Kill Nex whilst completing the requirements for "There is no escape", "Shadows move", "A siphon will solve this", and "Contain this!"

420.name: Shadows Move...
420.description: Kill Nex without anyone being hit by the Shadow Smash attack.

421.name: Tombs Speed Runner
421.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (normal) within 18 mins at any group size.

422.name: Tombs Speed Runner II
422.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (expert) within 20 mins at any group size.

423.name: Tombs Speed Runner III
423.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (expert) within 18 mins in a group of 8.

424.name: You are not prepared
424.description: Complete a full Tombs of Amascut raid only using supplies given inside the tomb and without anyone dying.

425.name: Helpful spirit who?
425.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut without using any supplies from the Helpful Spirit and without anyone dying. Honey locusts are included in this restriction.

426.name: Resourceful Raider
426.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut with the "On a diet" and "Dehydration" invocations activated and without anyone dying.

427.name: But... Damage
427.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut without anyone in your party wearing or holding any equipment at tier 75 or above.

429.name: Fancy feet
429.description: Complete phase three of The Wardens in a group of two or more, using only melee attacks and without dying yourself. The 'Insanity' invocation must be activated.

430.name: Hardcore Raiders
430.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in a group of two or more without anyone dying.

431.name: Hardcore Tombs
431.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut solo without dying.

432.name: Perfect Het
432.description: Complete the Het room without taking any damage from the light beam and orbs. You must destroy the core after one exposure.

433.name: Perfect Akkha
433.description: Complete Akkha in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: Akkha's attacks off-prayer, Akkha's special attacks (orbs, memory, detonate), exploding shadow timers, orbs in the enrage phase or attacking Akkha with the wrong style. You must have all Akkha invocations activated.

434.name: Perfection of Het
434.description: Complete 'Perfect Het' and 'Perfect Akkha' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

435.name: Perfect Apmeken
435.description: Complete the Apmeken room in a group of two or more, without anyone allowing any dangers to trigger, standing in venom or being hit by a volatile baboon. You must complete this room in less than three minutes.

436.name: Perfect Ba-Ba
436.description: Defeat Ba-Ba in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: Ba-Ba's Attacks off-prayer, Ba-Ba's slam, rolling boulders, rubble attack or falling rocks. No sarcophagi may be opened. You must have all Ba-Ba invocations activated.

437.name: Perfection of Apmeken
437.description: Complete 'Perfect Apmeken' and 'Perfect Ba-Ba' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

438.name: Perfect Crondis
438.description: Complete the Crondis room without letting a crocodile get to the tree, without anyone losing water from their container and in under one minute.

439.name: Perfect Zebak
439.description: Defeat Zebak without anyone taking any damage from: poison, Zebak's basic attacks off-prayer, blood spawns and waves. You also must not push more than two jugs on the roar attack during the fight (you may destroy stationary ones). You must have all Zebak invocations activated.

440.name: Perfection of Crondis
440.description: Complete 'Perfect Crondis' and 'Perfect Zebak' in a single run of the Tombs of Amascut.

441.name: Perfect Scabaras
441.description: Complete the Scabaras room in less than a minute without anyone taking any damage from puzzles.

442.name: Perfect Kephri
442.description: Defeat Kephri in a group of two or more, without anyone taking any damage from the following: egg explosions, Kephri's attacks, Exploding Scarabs, Bodyguards, dung attacks. No eggs may hatch throughout the fight.

443.name: Perfection of Scabaras
443.description: Complete 'Perfect Scabaras' and 'Perfect Kephri' in a single run of Tombs of Amascut.

444.name: Perfect Wardens
444.description: Defeat The Wardens in a group of two or more, without anyone taking avoidable damage from the following: Warden attacks, obelisk attacks, lightning attacks in phase three, skull attack in phase three, Demi god attacks in phase three. You must have all Wardens invocations activated.

445.name: Insanity
445.description: Complete 'Perfect Wardens' at expert or above.

446.name: Amascut's Remnant
446.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut at raid level 500 or above without anyone dying.

447.name: Something of an expert myself
447.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut raid at level 350 or above without anyone dying.

448.name: Maybe I'm the boss.
448.description: Complete a Tombs of Amascut raid with every single boss invocation activated and without anyone dying.

449.name: Dropped the ball
449.description: Defeat Akkha without dropping any materialising orbs and without dying yourself.

450.name: Akkhan't Do it
450.description: Defeat Akkha with all Akkha invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

451.name: No skipping allowed
451.description: Defeat Ba-Ba after only attacking the non-weakened boulders in the rolling boulder phase, without dying yourself. The Boulderdash invocation must be activated.

452.name: I'm in a rush
452.description: Defeat Ba-Ba after destroying four or fewer rolling boulders in total without dying yourself.

453.name: Ba-Bananza
453.description: Defeat Ba-Ba with all Ba-Ba invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

454.name: All Praise Zebak
454.description: Defeat Zebak without losing a single prayer point. You must also meet the conditions of the 'Rockin' Around The Croc' achievement.

455.name: Rockin' around the croc
455.description: Defeat Zebak with all Zebak invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

456.name: Doesn't bug me
456.description: Defeat Kephri with all Kephri invocations activated and the path levelled up to at least four, without dying yourself.

457.name: All out of medics
457.description: Defeat Kephri without letting her heal above 25% after the first down. The 'Medic' invocation must be activated. You must do this without dying yourself.

458.name: Down Do Specs
458.description: Defeat the Wardens after staggering the boss a maximum of twice during phase two, without dying yourself.

459.name: Better get movin'
459.description: Defeat Elidinis' Warden in phase three of the Wardens fight with 'Aerial Assault', 'Stay vigilant' and 'Insanity' invocations activated and without dying yourself.

460.name: Warden't you believe it
460.description: Defeat the Wardens with all Wardens invocations activated, at expert level and without dying yourself.

461.name: Novice Tomb Explorer
461.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in Entry mode (or above) once.

462.name: Novice Tomb Looter
462.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in Entry mode (or above) 25 times.

463.name: Novice Tomb Raider
463.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut in Entry mode (or above) 50 times.

464.name: Movin' on up
464.description: Complete a Tombs of Amascut raid at level 50 or above.

465.name: Confident Raider
465.description: Complete a Tombs of Amascut raid at level 100 or above.

466.name: Tomb Looter
466.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut 25 times.

467.name: Tomb Raider
467.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut 50 times.

468.name: Tomb Explorer
468.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut once.

469.name: Expert Tomb Explorer
469.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) once.

470.name: Expert Tomb Looter
470.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) 25 times.

471.name: Expert Tomb Raider
471.description: Complete the Tombs of Amascut (Expert mode) 50 times.

472.name: More than just a ranged weapon
472.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah by only dealing damage to it with a salamander.

473.name: Can't Escape
473.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah without running.

474.name: Essence Farmer
474.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah 10 times in one trip.

475.name: Phantom Muspah Speed-Trialist
475.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah in less than 3 minutes without a slayer task.

476.name: Phantom Muspah Speed-Chaser
476.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah in less than 2 minutes without a slayer task.

477.name: Phantom Muspah Speed-Runner
477.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah in less than 1 minute and 30 seconds without a slayer task.

481.name: Space is Tight
481.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah whilst it is surrounded by spikes.

482.name: Versatile Drainer
482.description: Drain the Phantom Muspah's Prayer with three different sources in one kill.

483.name: Walk Straight Pray True
483.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah without taking any avoidable damage.

484.name: Phantom Muspah Manipulator
484.description: Kill the Phantom Muspah whilst completing Walk Straight Pray True, Space is Tight & Can't Escape.

485.name: Vardorvis Speed-Trialist
485.description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 1:15 minutes without a slayer task.

486.name: Vardorvis Speed-Chaser
486.description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 1:05 without a slayer task.

487.name: Vardorvis Speed-Runner
487.description: Kill Vardorvis in less than 0:55 without a slayer task.

491.name: Perfect Vardorvis
491.description: Kill Vardorvis perfectly 5 times without leaving.

492.name: Axe Enthusiast
492.description: Kill Vardorvis after surviving for 3 minutes of Vardorvis' max speed, and never leaving the centre 25 tiles.

493.name: Budget Cutter
493.description: Kill Vardorvis with gear worth 2m or less in total.

494.name: Whisperer Speed-Trialist
494.description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 3:00 without a slayer task.

495.name: Whisperer Speed-Chaser
495.description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 2:20 without a slayer task.

496.name: Whisperer Speed-Runner
496.description: Kill the Whisperer in less than 2:00 without a slayer task.

500.name: Perfect Whisperer
500.description: Kill the Whisperer without taking avoidable damage 5 times without leaving.

501.name: Tentacular
501.description: Kill the Whisperer whilst only being on the Arceuus spellbook.

502.name: Dark Memories
502.description: Kill the Whisperer whilst spending less than 6 seconds in the pre-enrage shadow realm.

503.name: Leviathan Speed-Trialist
503.description: Kill the Leviathan in less than 1:50 without a slayer task.

504.name: Leviathan Speed-Chaser
504.description: Kill the Leviathan in less than 1:25 without a slayer task.

505.name: Leviathan Speed-Runner
505.description: Kill the Leviathan in less than 1:10 without a slayer task.

509.name: Perfect Leviathan
509.description: Kill the Leviathan perfectly 5 times without leaving.

510.name: Serpentine Solo
510.description: Kill the Leviathan without stunning the boss more than once.

511.name: Unconventional
511.description: Kill the Leviathan using only Mithril ammunition whilst having no more than 25 Hitpoints throughout the entire fight.

512.name: Duke Sucellus Speed-Trialist
512.description: Kill Duke Sucellus in less than 1:45 minutes without a slayer task.

513.name: Duke Sucellus Speed-Chaser
513.description: Kill Duke Sucellus in less than 1:30 minutes without a slayer task.

514.name: Duke Sucellus Speed-Runner
514.description: Kill Duke Sucellus in less than 1:20 minutes without a slayer task.

518.name: Perfect Duke Sucellus
518.description: Kill Duke Sucellus without taking any avoidable damage 5 times without leaving.

519.name: Cold Feet
519.description: Kill Duke Sucellus without taking any avoidable damage, whilst also never running.

520.name: Mirror Image
520.description: Kill Duke Sucellus whilst only attacking the boss on the same tick Duke attacks you.

523.name: Sit Rat
523.description: Finish off Scurrius with a ratbane weapon in a private instance.

524.name: Perfect Scurrius
524.description: Kill Scurrius in a private instance without taking damage from the following attacks: Tail Swipe and Falling Bricks. Pray correctly against the following attacks: Flying Fur and Bolts of Electricity.

525.name: Efficient Pest Control
525.description: Kill 6 Giant Rats within Scurrius' lair in 3 seconds.
